column2: CORE PURPOSE OF THE JOB:  The person will be responsible for managing relationships with Banks/NBFC partners of Indifi. He / She will be involved in increasing business volumes with various lending partners and aligning the lenders on process flow, KYC and documentation and product integration in the Indifi system and coordinating with internal stakeholders to ensure seamless disbursements. (Internal stakeholders w.r.t. operations, credit, finance, collections, customer service etc.) AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY :   Managing existing relationships with Banks/NBFC partners of Indifi.  Responsible for business volumes with various partners and ensuring scale up of partnerships.  Aligning the lenders on process flow, KYC and documentation and product integration and coordinating with internal stakeholders to ensure seamless disbursements. (Internal stakeholders w.r.t. operations, credit, finance, collections, customer service, legal, etc.)  Create SOPs, process notes, best practices document that impact all activities between internal stakeholders like Finance, Credit, Collections, Customer Service, Technology, etc. with Indifi's external stakeholders/lenders.  Responsible for managing end to end process of lead assignment, approval, disbursal, and post sanction follow up with respect to different programs including co-lending partnership with leading banks.  Determine performance benchmarks and identify course of action in case of breach.  Automate Credit Policies to ensure no/minimal manual Intervention in assessing the creditworthiness  Monitor the delinquent accounts to ensure the achievement of company standards/benchmark of the delinquency.  Identifying technological solutions to improve existing processes and overall portfolio management functions  Driving integration on various aspects of the strategic partnership across Credit, Operations, Risk Management, Technology and Product.  Develop and maintain reporting & application systems and coordinate information exchange with partner lenders.  Ensure all tasks, deliverables and documentation are created with the highest level of accuracy.  Assist in developing business processes to ensure operational efficiency and profitability.  Managing operational disbursements related escalations & timely resolution of the same RELEVANT EXPERIENCE: 3-5 years of relevant experience in Project management / Multi Stakeholder Management COMPETENCIES: a) Stakeholder Management (Internal and External Parties) b) Good grip on Excel c) Commercial Orientation / Good in building relationships

column2: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Senior Manager to spearhead Branch Transformation and Change Management efforts in India's largest NBFC. This pivotal role will be instrumental in driving strategic initiatives aimed at enhancing operational efficiency, customer experience, and overall business performance within our branch network. We are looking for a visionary leader with a proven track record of successfully leading transformative change initiatives in the lending industry. Preferred: Relationship Managers from banks or Sales Managers from NBFCs with Local language proficiency. Job Locations: Bengaluru, Ahmedabad, Kochi, Lucknow Retail Business Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of branch transformation initiatives, tracking key performance indicators and making data-driven decisions to drive continuous improvement. Evaluate the growth strategy based on competitor analysis and feedback from different channels/customers. Manage the internal (Branches/ other business verticals) and external (empaneled outsourced agencies) lead generating channels to generate the expected business Device strategies to counter competition and maximize market share in the Catchment area of the branch, by below the line activities and promotions. Stay abreast of industry trends, best practices, emerging technologies and competitor strategies related to branch operations and lending services in assigned geographies Formulating business strategies and strategic utilization and deployment of available resources for the region to achieve organizational business objectives. Branch Transformation Drive and manage digital transformation journey of the organization in line with management objectives Develop and execute comprehensive strategies for branch transformation, focusing on streamlining processes, improving productivity, and optimizing customer service delivery. Recommend process changes to improve service efficiency and quality across the branch network. Develop market leadership for key regions in collaboration with the Centre of Excellence through strategic initiatives. Share knowledge with other branches and headquarters on effective practices, competitive intelligence, business opportunities and needs. Foster a culture of continuous improvement and innovation within the branch network, encouraging feedback and participation from branch staff. Develop and deliver training programs to support staff in adapting to new processes, systems, and technologies. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify key areas for improvement and drive the Gimplementation of innovative solutions - gather requirements for digital transformation, stimulate and promote new digital capabilities Maintaining quality & performance of the business, preparing various reports of the same and take necessary actions for growth of business in branch Provide support for new product launches, and champion new sales initiatives  CHANGE MANAGEMENT Lead change management initiatives by effectively communicating vision, objectives, and expectations to stakeholders at all levels of the organization. Implement change initiatives in the areas of branch space rationalization/ optimization, transaction migration, systems implementation, process Re-engineering and premises reconfiguration Identify process automation opportunities and drive Digital penetration in the Branches PEOPLE MANAGEMENT Develop training materials and documentation for internal business users and coordinate ongoing training sessions Drive and embed a strong performance culture through inspiring, motivating and rigorous performance management discipline. Develop and build talents within branch through optimal resourcing, capacity planning, succession planning and engagements Identify and address training and development needs of staff on an on-going basis Coaching, mentoring and training employees and providing them regular updates on products and service offerings along with dessimination of best parctises in the market Products Ownership Implement all product initiatives in the catchment (SME, Auto loans, PL, Commercial) Jointly own the delivery of product (SME, Auto loans, PL, Commercial) objectives with the clusters Active involvement in internal testing and UAT phases and clarify requirements where necessary. Work with IT Digital transformation team to regularly monitor and review performance, suggest ideas for improvements and enhance efficiency Help in defining the product phases along with establishing product market fit Interested candidates can share their cvs with jerin.c@novactech.in / 7845690386.

column2: Scouting candidates for Financial Spreading, Covenant monitoring & Testing and Quality check Title  : Sr. Associate/ Delivery Lead/ Manager Location  : Pune (Work from office) Role & responsibilities    Analyzing and spreading the financial statements in Moody's Risk Analyst (MRA) / Credit lens / client customized templates. Analysis of financial statements including Income statement, Balance Sheet & cash flow of public & private companies for the credit appraisal process. Going through the supplementary schedules, notes and MD&A for the detailed breakups and adjustments. Normalizing the financial statement for exceptional and non-recurring items to arrive at the true profitability figures. Calculating the Adjusted Net Worth, Recurring Cash Flows, Annual Debt Service, Contingent Liabilities, Custom Ratios and other financial metrics. Screening the credit agreements and analyzing the financial covenants applicable to the borrower Monitor Covenant compliance and reporting. Conduct detailed quality checks of client deliverables. Managing capacity, efficiency and accuracy of the process  Key Competencies-  Experience of 6-11 years in spreading, covenant monitoring & testing and quality check.  Analyze and deliver assigned deals/tasks within committed timelines.  Update required trackers with latest status/updates   Proficient in Advanced MS Excel   Prior experience of working on Moodys Risk Analyst (MRA) is preferred   Excellent written and spoken communication skills

column2: Main Mission:  Export LC processes (Advising, Amendment, Confirmation, Transfer, and Assignment of proceeds, Negotiation, LC Forfaiting, LC discounting, FX Loans, Reimbursement Claims and payments)  Import LC processes (Issuance, Amendment, Negotiation, and Import Financing (Trust Receipt Loans), Reimbursement authorization, honor and Acceptance & Payments  Documentary Collections (Lodging Bills, Acceptance and Payments)  Handling of Guarantee Issuances, Amendments, Advising, Claims, Book off and Commission collections  Main Responsibilities:  1. Handling Letter of credit transactions and collection (Exports & Imports) and Guarantees  a. Scrutiny and review of LC transactions like Advising, Issuance, Amendments, and Negotiations & Settlements.  b. Imports and export collections transactions.  c. Transfers LC, Confirmations, Financing - LC Forfaiting, LC discounting, Trust Receipt Loans, FX Loan (Booking and settlement of foreign currency Loan related to L/C & D/C financing).  d. Process all transactions with high priority related to compliance and sanctions related issues.  e. Ability to handle all types of SWIFT Messages.  f. Guarantee Issuances, Amendments, Advising, Claims, Book off and Commission collections.  2. To complete the workflow on daily basis and pending transactions should escalated to Lead with updated reasons  3. Processing within the SLAs as required by the Client.  4. Raising technical queries, discrepancies to Lead and process as per his/her instructions.  5. Updates on operational procedures and special practices should be shared with Lead and help him in maintaining the standard operating procedure on regular basis.  6. Be a backup for the Lead  7. Attend Training programs.  a. Should have urge to learn other products in Trade finance.  b. Attend all training conducted within the team on all process and procedural updates. Profile Required: Technical / Functional skills : At least 1-3 years of experience and basic knowledge in Trade Finance Operations Exposure towards European market is preferable Good knowledge of office automation tools (advanced in Excel (Pivot table), medium in Power point Basic Knowledge in UCP, URR, ISBP and URC (Latest version). Knowledge and experience in handling commercial documents in international trade. Knowledge in Compliance regulations (Anti-boycott languages, Anti-Money laundering, and OFAC - Office of the Foreign Asset Control) French skills (Read, Write and Speak) is a must. Behavioral competencies  Willing to work with various shifts (especially in Europe timing) Excellent written and oral communication skills Analytical skills and process oriented Ability to work under pressure and work as part of the team. Work experience - 0.6 - 2 years of work exp with at B1 level DELF Certification or Equivalent.
column11: Trade Finance Operations, Letter of credit, French, UCP, Anti-Money laundering, Transaction Processing, collection

column2: Aavas Financiers Limited Job Description: Zonal Credit Manager Designation:  Zonal Credit Manager Qualification Required:  CA/ICWA/Other PG Graduation (Finance) Experience: 10 - 15 Years Key Roles and Responsibilities: Responsible for Credit distribution network, Credit administration and Risk. Portfolio Management and deciding Policy riders and implementation in the scenario to state. Active participation in Policy designing and implementation of product centric approach. Risk Analysis and Collection monitoring with the help of State collection resources. Supervision for Credit Underwriting and appraisal of proposals. Credit analysis of Home Loans and excellent understanding of credit metrics,  Ensuring completion of credit/KYC documents, Verification  Telephonic, filed & collateral visits,  Financial analysis, Personal visits and discussions with hirers and proposed hirers,  Responsible for controlling early delinquency and Infant delinquency review,  Designing and forwarding corrective actions based on Root Cause Analysis of portfolio and feedback from support groups, PDD and delinquency reporting and analysis,  Maintaining overall health of the portfolio, Liaise with various cross functional teams such as accounts, operations, sales, collections, marketing etc,  Ratio analysis of financials of customers of commercial usage requirements, Meet TAT and review key metrics to measure controls, efficiency. Desired Candidate Profile: Must possess excellent communication as well as writing skills. Must demonstrate capability to manage team and take additional responsibilities. Candidate must be flexible in visiting sites and locations. Deep experience & understanding of financial services across NBFCs and Banking
column11: Underwriting, Sanction, Credit Approval, Team Leading

column2: Lead and manage the Growth and Sales teams to achieve revenue targets for the organization. Collaborate cross-functionally with internal and external partners to drive business growth and optimize revenue generation. Monitor lead generation costs and implement strategies to manage and optimize cost-effectiveness.  Oversee and analyse the business funnel and call center performance on a daily basis, identifying areas for improvement and implementing corrective measures as needed. Provide strategic insights and recommendations to senior management regarding growth opportunities, new areas of business expansion, and overall business strategy. Utilize data analysis and insights to drive decision-making and inform strategic initiatives. Stay abreast of industry trends, market dynamics, and competitive landscape to identify opportunities for growth and innovation. Foster a culture of collaboration, innovation, and excellence within the Revenue team and across the organization. Key Skills: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, Economics, or related field; Master's degree preferred. Proven experience in a senior leadership role within the financial services industry, with a focus on revenue generation and business growth; minimum 10 years of experience in relevant industry and role. Strong understanding of digital lending marketplace dynamics and trends. Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. Demonstrated ability to effectively collaborate cross-functionally and influence stakeholders at all levels of the organization. Strategic thinker with a track record of developing and executing successful growth strategies. Proficiency in data analysis and experience leveraging data-driven insights to inform decision-making. Results-oriented mindset with a focus on achieving and exceeding revenue targets. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt to changing priorities and business needs.
column11: Lead Generation, Revenue Management, Revenue, Revenue Generation, Team Handling, Sales Strategy, Revenue Maximization, Revenue Expansion, Revenue Planning
